Articles.Content: As the title says, I just found I have two bills, the first is on my space station and the second one just appeared in a rocket now, but idk what could happen, for all I know the second one is a krussian spy attempting to sabatoge my space program should I kill him or something? What should I do?
Put him in the same capsule as the first one and watch them annihilate.
I don't want to destroy my space station though... And without mechjeb I'll never get them to encounter each other without taking forever, plus it's orbiting just above the atmosphere,
One bill is more than enough

Oh, you know how this works. Let the doppelgÃƒÂ¤nger Bill enter the capsule, then engage the {REDACTED} just to the left of the {REDACTED} and let the {REDACTED} {REDACTED} {REDACTED} {REDACTED} {REDACTED} unless the {REDACTED} {REDACTED} {REDACTED} {REDACTED} {REDACTED}. Good luck.
I've got three Jebs at the moment. May God have mercy on our souls.
If their both in the same ship but not the same module will they still annihilate each other? And will the station explode?

*Announcement on kerspeaker* "Since we cannot risk him being a krussian spy, this Bill Kerman impostor, by the orders of the Emerald Empire, shall be executed. He shall be executed via re-entry, the execution shall be in 15 minutes"

Lol first time I've sent a Kerbal on re-entry without a capsule, this will be fun but I can't upload pics until tomorow cause my mom apparently thinks she needs to turn my Internet off at 8:00 PM for my computer

Spy or not, I think you will find they are all very much quality Bills.

I have three on my space station at the moment.

As the title says, I just found I have two bills, the first is on my space station and the second one just appeared in a rocket now, but idk what could happen, for all I know the second one is a krussian spy attempting to sabatoge my space program should I kill him or something? What should I do?
That made me spit coke out my mouth

What's funny is that as soon as I posted that, he started screaming XD

Edit: gunna have to figure out how to recover a crew-less lander on a highly eccentric orbit...

What's funny is that as soon as I posted that, he started screaming XD

Omg, KSP has become self-aware.

Quick, disconnect from the internet before we are overtaken by K-Net!

Omg, KSP has become self-aware.

Quick, disconnect from the internet before we are overtaken by K-Net!

Lol the Internet was already off for my computer.

O.o, that. Was. Awesome. He came in at maybe 3000 m/s and hit the ground and went poof, lol the log says his blast awesomeness was 0 XD I'm gunna do it again tomorrow XD

Edited May 26, 2013 by Deadpangod3

Ugh, my parents made me go places all day, so i couldn't upload pics

Oh god... Jeb doesn't want to wait for the space shuttle to arrive to return him to Kerbin,

*yells at the other mission control people* DON'T LET HIM GET OUT OF THAT CAPSULE!!

*warning appears on scream* "Hatch door opened"

Jebediah Kerman: SPAAAAAAAACE!!!!

Get the Jebediah Kerman grave marker ready...

Severe maniacle laughter is expected

(P.S. bump )

Edited May 26, 2013 by Deadpangod3
